charts.content: Is the market really a good teacher?

series.value: sum ( Households , unemployed , t ) : sum ( Households , agents , t )
series.label: Unemployment

series.value: sum ( Industry , production.vol , t-11...t ) : sum ( Industry , production.vol , t-23...t-12 ) -1
series.label: Output growth

series.x: 100*sum ( Households , unemployed , t-11...t ) : sum ( Households , agents , t-11...t )
series.y: 100*( sum ( Households , wages , t-11...t ) * sum ( Households , employed , t-23...t-12 ) ) : ( sum ( Households , employed , t-11...t ) * sum ( Households , wages , t-23...t-12 ) ) - 100
series.label: Wages

series.x: 100*sum ( Households , unemployed , t-11...t ) : sum ( Households , agents , t-11...t )
series.y: 100*sum ( Industry , jobVacancies , t-11...t ) : sum ( Industry , workforceTarget , t-11...t )

series.label: Debt Ratio
series.value: 100*sum ( Industry , liabilities , t ) : sum ( Industry , assets , t )

series.label: Weighted
series.value: 100*sum ( Industry , liabilities.target , t ) : sum ( Industry , assets , t )
sum ( Industry , capacity , t ) : sum ( Industry , firms , t )
series.label: Average

series.value: 100 * sum ( Industry , investment.size , t ) : sum ( Industry , capacity , t-1 )
series.label: Investment

series.value: agentValue ( Industry , liabilities , t , &aFirm; ) : agentValue ( Industry , assets , t , &aFirm; )
series.label: Debt Ratio

series.value: agentValue ( Industry , liabilities.target , t , &aFirm; ) : agentValue ( Industry , assets , t , &aFirm; )
series.label: Target

series.value: 100*agentValue ( Industry , debt.longTerm , t , &aFirm; ) : agentValue ( Industry , machinery.val , t , &aFirm; )
series.label: Long Term Loans / Fixed Capital

series.value: 100*agentValue ( Industry , liabilities.target , t , &aFirm; ) : agentValue ( Industry , assets , t , &aFirm; )
series.label: Target

series.value: 100*agentValue ( Industry , debt.shortTerm , t , &aFirm; ) : ( agentValue ( Industry , inventories.inProcess.val , t , &aFirm; ) + agentValue ( Industry , inventories.fg.val , t , &aFirm; ) + agentValue ( Industry , cash , t , &aFirm; ) )
series.label: Current Liabilities / Current Assets

chart.title: Long Term Debt and Fixed Capital

series.label: Unemployment

Min (Firms)

series.label: Max (Firms)

series.label: Min (Workers)

series.label: Max (Workers)

chart.title: Real assets and debt maturity structure

series.value: ( sum ( Industry , inventories.inProcess.val , t-11...t ) + sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.val , t-11...t ) ) * sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.vol , t-11...t ) : sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.val , t-11...t )
series.label: Circulating capital

series.value: sum ( Banks , loans.shortTerm , t-11...t ) * sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.vol , t-11...t ) : sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.val , t-11...t )
series.label: Short term debt

series.value: sum ( Industry , machinery.val , t-11...t ) : mean ( Industry , prices , t-11...t )
series.label: Fixed capital

series.value: sum ( Banks , loans.longTerm , t-11...t ) : mean ( Industry , prices , t-11...t )
series.label: Long term debt
Bankruptcy rate

series.label: Target (weighted by assets)

series.label: Debt service coverage ratio
series.value: ( sum ( Industry , grossProfit , t-11...t ) - sum ( Industry , fixedCapital.depreciation , t-11...t ) ) : sum ( Industry , debt.repaid , t-11...t )

series.label: Solvency Ratio
series.value: 12 * sum ( Industry , grossProfit , t-11...t ) : sum ( Industry , liabilities , t-11...t )

series.x: sum ( Households , employed , t-11 ... t ) : sum ( Households , agents ,t-11 ... t)
series.y: sum ( Households , wages ,t-11 ... t ) : ( sum ( Households , wages , t-11 ... t ) + sum ( Industry , grossProfit , t-11 ... t ) )
series.label: Wages
Ratio of own funds to total assets

item.series: sum ( Industry , production.vol.atFullCapacity , t ) : sum ( Industry , production.vol.atFullCapacity , t-11 ) -1

series.value: 2 * ( sum ( Industry , dividends , t-11...t ) + sum ( Industry , capital , t ) - sum ( Industry , capital , t-12 ) ) : ( sum ( Industry , capital , t-12 ) +sum ( Industry , capital , t ) )
series.label: S1

series.value: 2 * ( sum ( Industry , dividends , t-11...t ) + sum ( Industry , capital , t ) - sum ( Industry , capital , t-12 ) ) : ( sum ( Industry , assets , t-12 ) +sum ( Industry , assets , t ) )

series.label: Defaults

series.value: ( sum ( Industry , inventories.inProcess.val , t-11...t ) + sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.val , t-11...t ) ) * sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.vol , t-11...t ) : sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.val , t-11...t )
series.label: Circulating Capital

series.value: sum ( Banks , loans.shortTerm , t-11...t ) * sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.vol , t-11...t ) : sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.val , t-11...t )
series.label: Short Term Loans

Gross Profit

series.label: Debt Repaid
series.value: sum ( Industry , debt.repaid , t-11...t ) * sum ( Industry , sales.vol , t-11...t ) : sum ( Industry , sales.val , t-11...t )

series.label: Interest

series.label: Banks

series.value: 2 * ( sum ( Households , dividends , t-11...t ) + sum ( Households , capital , t ) - sum ( Households , capital , t-12 ) ) : ( sum ( Industry , assets , t-12 ) +sum ( Industry , assets , t ) +sum ( Banks , assets , t-12 ) +sum ( Banks , assets , t ) )

series.label: Industry

series.label: Banks

series.label: Average

series.label: sector 1

series.label: Target

series.value: sum ( Industry , debt.shortTerm , t-11...t , name=&aFirm; ) : ( sum ( Industry , inventories.inProcess.val , t-11...t , name=&aFirm; ) + sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.val , t-11...t , name=&aFirm; ) + sum ( Industry , cash , t-11...t , name=&aFirm; ) )
series.label: Current Liabilities / Current Assets

series.label: Firm

series.value: sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.vol , t-11...t , name=&aFirm; ) : sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.vol.normal , t-11...t , name=&aFirm; )
series.label: Inventories to Target Ratio

series.value: 12 * ( sum ( Industry , grossProfit , t-11...t,name=&aFirm; ) * sum ( Industry , investment.size , t-11...t ) ) : (sum ( Industry , capacity , t-11...t , name=&aFirm; ) * sum ( Industry , investment.val , t-11...t ) )
series.label: Firm

series.value: 12 * ( sum ( Industry , grossProfit , t-11...t ) * sum ( Industry , investment.size , t-11...t ) ) : ( sum ( Industry , capacity , t-11...t ) * sum ( Industry , investment.val , t-11...t ) )
series.label: Sector

series.label: Average

series.value: sum ( Industry , capital , t ) : sum ( Industry , assets , t )
series.label: Average

series.value: agentValue ( Industry , capital , t , &aFirm; ) : agentValue ( Industry , assets , t , &aFirm; )
series.label: &aFirm;

series.value: agentValue ( Industry , dividends , t , &aFirm; ) : agentValue ( Industry , assets , t , &aFirm; )
series.label: dividends

series.value: agentValue ( Industry , grossProfit , t , &aFirm; ) : agentValue ( Industry , assets , t , &aFirm; )
series.label: profits

series.value: agentValue ( Industry , production.vol.atFullCapacity , t , &aFirm; ) * agentValue ( Industry , workforceTarget , t , &aFirm; ) : agentValue ( Industry , capacity , t , &aFirm; )
series.label: Target

series.value: agentValue ( Industry , production.vol , t , &aFirm; ) * agentValue ( Industry , capacity , t , &aFirm; ) : ( agentValue ( Industry , production.vol.atFullCapacity , t , &aFirm; ) * agentValue ( Industry , workforceTarget , t , &aFirm; ) )
series.label: Production

item.label: Production/Target
item.series: agentValue ( Industry , production.vol , t , &aFirm; ) * agentValue ( Industry , capacity , t , &aFirm; ) : ( agentValue ( Industry , production.vol.atFullCapacity , t , &aFirm; ) * agentValue ( Industry , workforceTarget , t , &aFirm; ) )

panel2.title: &aFirm;: wage

series.value: ( agentValue ( Industry , workforceTarget , t , &aFirm; ) - agentValue ( Industry , workforce , t , &aFirm; ) ) : agentValue ( Industry , workforceTarget , t , &aFirm; )

series.value: agentValue ( Industry , liabilities , t , &aFirm; ) : agentValue ( Industry , assets , t , &aFirm; )
series.label: Debt Ratio

series.label: Target

series.label: Capital Ratio

series.label: dividends

series.value: sum ( Banks , capital , t ) : sum ( Banks , liabilities , t )
series.label: Capital

series.value: sum ( Banks , doubtfulDebt , t ) : sum ( Banks , liabilities , t )
series.label: Doubtful Debt

series.value: ( sum ( Banks , canceledDebts , t ) - sum ( Banks , foreclosures.val , t ) ) : sum ( Banks , liabilities , t )
series.label: Cost of Bankruptcies

series.value: sum ( Industry , cash , t ) + sum ( Industry , cash , t )
series.label: Firms

series.value: 12 * sum (Households , income, t-11...t) : sum ( Banks , liabilities , t-11...t )
series.label: Velocity of Money

series.value: sum ( Banks , canceledDebts , t ) - sum ( Banks , foreclosures.val , t )
series.label: Cost of Bankruptcies

series.value: sum ( Banks , loans.shortTerm , t ) : sum ( Banks , assets , t )
series.label: Short Term Loans

series.value: sum ( Banks , loans.longTerm , t ) : sum ( Banks , assets , t )
series.label: Long Term Loans

series.value: sum ( Banks , loans.longTerm , t ) : mean ( Industry , prices , t )
series.label: Long Term Loans

series.value: sum ( Industry , machinery.val , t ) : mean ( Industry , prices , t )
series.label: Fixed Capital

series.value: sum ( Banks , loans.shortTerm , t ) * sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.vol , t ) : sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.val , t )
series.label: Short Term Loans

series.value: ( sum ( Industry , inventories.inProcess.val , t ) + sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.val , t ) ) * sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.vol , t ) : sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.val , t )
series.label: Circulating Capital

series.value: sum ( Banks , liabilities , t ) : sum ( Industry , assets , t )
series.label: Total Debt / Total Assets

chart.title: Long Term Debt to Fixed Capital

series.value: sum ( Banks , loans.longTerm , t ) : sum ( Industry , machinery.val , t )
series.label: Long Term Loans / Fixed Capital

chart.title: Short Term Debt to Circulating Capital

series.value: sum ( Banks , loans.shortTerm , t ) : ( sum ( Industry , inventories.inProcess.val , t ) + sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.val , t ) )
series.label: Short Term Loans / Circulating Capital

series.value: sum ( Households , unemployed , t ) : sum ( Households , agents , t )
series.label: Unemployment

series.value: sum ( Households , wages , t ) : sum ( Households , employed , t )
series.label: Average

series.value: sum ( Industry , grossProfit , t ) - sum ( Industry , inventories.depreciation , t )
series.label: Profits

series.value: ( sum ( Households , cash , t ) + sum ( Households , capital , t ) ) : ( sum ( Households , wages , t ) + sum ( Industry , grossProfit , t ) - sum ( Industry , inventories.depreciation , t ) )
series.label: Savings

series.value: sum ( Households , wages , t ) : ( sum ( Households , wages , t ) + sum ( Households , dividends , t ) )
series.label: Wages

series.value: sum ( Households , dividends , t ) : ( sum ( Households , wages , t ) + sum ( Households , dividends , t ) )
series.label: Dividends

series.value: 1000*val ( Simulation , period , t ) : val ( Simulation , time , t )
series.label: Average

series.value: 1000: ( val ( Simulation , time , t ) -val ( Simulation , time , t-1 ) )
series.label: Instantaneous
size vis-a-vis debt targets (slope of the regression line)

series.x: sum ( Industry , production.vol.atFullCapacity , t-11...t ) : sum ( Industry , production.vol.atFullCapacity , t-23...t-12 ) -1
series.y: slope ( Industry , targetDebtRatio?capacity , t )
